In Lite Mode, Google Play Service will be disabled for fewer memory and power usage. Please turn it off when clones are using Google services. Are you sure to switch on Lite Mode?

New version is coming! We improved a lot on version %s. Would you like to update Power Cloner now?
Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Please tell us the detail about the problem you met , and please tell us the steps to reproduce it and better with screenshot.
Click here to check our handy FAQ.
We will resolve the issue for you ASAP and appreciate your help to improve the product!
Q1: Why cannot I receive message notifications from Power Cloner enabled apps?
A1: Please ensure that Power Cloner has network access
Q2: Will Power Cloner collect and use my private information?

A2: No, Power Cloner will only collect small amounts of your “public data” (e.g. Avatar, nickname etc), and these will only be used within your device to create a better user experience for you. Power Cloner promises that none of your private data will be collected or used.
Q3: Why is Power Cloner’s storage consumption increasing?

A3: All sub-accounts added on your device are by default listed under Power Cloner by the Android operating system. For example, when you add a Facebook sub-account to your device, all of the storage used for your second Facebook account (app) is listed under Power Cloner. Therefore, the storage consumption listed for Power Cloner will appear to increase significantly when you add more sub-accounts. Rest assured that the storage consumption of Power Cloner itself is not actually increasing by much.
Q4: Why has Power Cloner used up so much storage space?

A4: All sub-accounts added on your device are by default listed under Power Cloner by the Android operating system. The large amount of storage consumption listed under Power Cloner is the overall total storage used for all sub-accounts you’ve added. Power Cloner itself uses little storage.
Q5: How does Power Cloner’s Private App function protects my privacy?

A5: A password is required to access Private Apps each time you wake your device. Additionally, all Private Apps are installed on Power Cloner, and therefore all Private Apps’ data are not accessible by any external programs.
Q6: Why privacy locker not show up when app launch?

A6: Please check whether you enabled locker for this app and grant permission to Power Cloner to show floating window. For example, on Xiaomi device, Settings->App Management->Power Cloner->Permission Control->Floating Window.
Q7: Why shortcut cannot be created or camera, location not work?
A7: Please check whether you granted these permissions to Power Cloner in your system setting.
Please allow permission request from Power Cloner, otherwise some cloned apps and Google Play Service will not work properly.
